response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and importance, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $9,500. This represents an exceptional opportunity to secure this high-quality item at a discounted rate, considering its original worth of $10,000. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
